files.title: int CUDA_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_DESC_v1::fd

files.summary: Flags must either be zero or CUDA_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_DEDICATED   CUDA Driver API TRM-06703-001 _vRelease Version  |  686   Data Structures...

files.title: void *CUDA_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_DESC_v1::handle
files.summary: Valid NT handle. Must be NULL if 'name' is non-NULL...

files.title: const void *CUDA_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_DESC_v1::name
files.summary: Name of a valid memory object. Must be NULL if 'handle' is non-NULL....

files.summary: A handle representing an NvSciBuf Object. Valid when type is CU_EXTERNAL_MEMORY_HANDLE_TYPE_NVSCIBUF...
